rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows to embrace natural light and Vastu alignment. Minimalistic Scandinavian design with wooden accents.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space connected to dining area, featuring large north-facing window for natural illumination in accordance with Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room with ample light from the north side. Clean lines and subtle wood details.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully integrated kitchen on ground floor. Efficient design with modern fixtures and storage, ensuring functional flow while maintaining Scandinavian simplicity.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom designed for convenience with minimalistic touches and sufficient ventilation.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample natural light and adherence to Vastu principles.
North-facing entrance door with Scandinavian design elements for an inviting feel.
Access to a west-facing balcony that overlooks the garden.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample storage and floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy, featuring soft Scandinavian hues.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for comfort with a focus on minimalism and functionality.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom attached to the master bedroom with efficient fixtures and design considerations.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space featuring built-in shelves, ambient lighting, and large windows for natural illumination while respecting Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large floor-to-ceiling window ensuring optimal light and Vastu alignment.
West-facing balcony with garden views, enhancing the serene atmosphere.

rooms.name: Storage Loft
rooms.description: Functional storage area designed for efficiency and accessibility, integrated into Scandinavian design principles.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Space for utilities including laundry, water heater, and other maintenance facilities. Designed with a focus on simplicity and organization.

openings.description: Optimized window placement ensuring proper light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Provides access to the roof area for maintenance, designed to be safe and compliant with local norms.
